body: 佛了，一群人本子里看剧情
Holy shit this is comedy gold. I'm Thai, and I was really confused when I saw the cover image, but I was laughing way too damn hard to even focus.
Fruit of Grisaia is porn. So other porn doesn't get an excuse.
its amazing that there are people who complain about the quality of the plot in porn

Isn't in the title it says " Inspired by Thai soap operas" So yeah!!, the plot is targeted on Thai readers just like "Heisaki" already made a point about this being satire to our country's dramas. And this is one of those plots about male/female protagonists crossdressing for whatever reason to get inside some rich mansion and in the end loved & married some heir of that rich family. (It such a cliche, i could see the ending from miles away). Seriously, how can my mom and my cousin can watch it everyday after news and never get sick by same plots & tropes is beyond me & my younger siblings. But that's just how it is...nice read BTW.

Try watching a real thing, it's way more absurd than this.
In Thai drama if you got a stick on mustache everyone will think you are a man. Seriously, that's how it is.
The translator missed the last two page that explain everything......  (.__ .)

lol, i like how all the weebs in the comment section are complaining about this manga not being from a japanese person. yeah, the plot is stupid, like 90% of the manga that's on this site. its not like most hentai is meant to be shakespeare level writing lol

Guys, this series is a parody of original famous Thai drama. So yes if you didn't watch the drama then you won't have any clue why is this or why is that. It will certainly think that the plot is pretty shit(as it already is from the drama). So please bear in mind that most of the stuff doesn't made to be read by foreigner since they were made for the locals.
this thailand dramatic plot :/ yeah this from thailand artist
The art is good but the story telling needs some serious work.  Although I say the art is good I should say there were some really bad parts as well.
This really made no sense... also it took me forever to figure out it was left to right <_< give a heads up, yeah? and gossip girls? really?

I logged in just to say 'WTF'
Why do you non-Japanese-manga-artist-wannabe have to make a story that has NO fucking plot and very F'd up
?
